message: I'd be more annoyed about it if the page title didn't say "boosh" in it.
Trying to go to www.twitter.com in the chrome address bar has sometimes been sending me to http://api.twitter.com/p_receiver.html

That happens to me randomly as well -- in both chrome and safari. Maybe 5% of the time when I click a link to twitter I see get sent to the api page. I just click back and click the link again and it works. New twitter is a little non-deterministic. :)
If you have a Twitter acc, and you have an Iphone Ipad or Ipod even just go to app store and download the App free and easy to use. I also like Flipboard
